content:
Craft an item of type: crimson_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 15}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 32, "index": 16}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 18, "index": 20}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a crimson_fence_gate I need to place sticks in the top and bottom left slots and crimson_planks in the middle left slot. Therefore I will first move one stick from slot 15 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: crimson_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 32, "index": 16}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 18, "index": 20}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Next I need to move the crimson_planks from slot 39 into slot 2 which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: crimson_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 32, "index": 16}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 18, "index": 20}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: I still need to place a stick on the bottom left slot so I will move another stick from slot 15 into slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 3 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 32, "index": 16}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 18, "index": 20}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To complete the recipe I also need to place a stick on the top right slot, so I will move another stick from slot 15 into slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 4 with quantity 1
